articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: World Health Organization warns window for stopping coronavirus epidemic is narrowing
articles.description: Japan, South Korea and Iran reported sharp spikes in coronavirus cases as the World Health Organization warned the window for stopping the epidemic is narrowing. Globally, nearly 78,000 people are infected and more than 2,300 have died. Debora Patta reports.
